references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This is the seminal work introducing Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), which forms the foundation of many of the techniques explored in the reviewed paper.

references.paper_title: Mip-nerf: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper addresses a key limitation of NeRFs by introducing a multiscale representation to improve anti-aliasing and rendering quality, directly relevant to the challenges addressed in the reviewed paper.
This work introduces bundle adjustment into the NeRF optimization process, refining pose estimation and improving reconstruction quality, which is a core technique used in the reviewed paper.

references.paper_title: Robust camera pose refinement for multi-resolution hash encoding
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the problem of pose refinement, which is crucial for accurate 3D reconstruction from LiDAR data, directly addressing the challenge tackled in the reviewed paper.

references.paper_title: Neural lidar fields for novel view synthesis
references.reason: This paper explores NeRFs specifically for LiDAR data, bridging the gap between image-based NeRFs and the point cloud data used in the reviewed paper, making it highly relevant.
